name: cbv3
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wnf(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution, that does not use ~ ax-c9 . (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-May-2018.)
